titleInfo.title: Letter no 27 of 1843 from Justin Sheil, HM Chargé D’Affaires, Tehran to Colonel Robertson, Persian Gulf Resident

mods.abstract: Justin Sheil, the British Envoy to the Court of the Shah of Persia, acknowledges receipt of a letter from the Resident about the looted and neglected state of the public buildings on the Island of Karrack [Kharg] in the Persian Gulf. Justin Sheil informs the Resident that the Persian Government has instructed the Prince of Sheeraz [Shiraz] to effect building repairs.
